description: If you can’t stand the heat… maybe it’s time to get out of the sauna and take a dip in the jacuzzi. For Logan Moore the heat shot up in the sauna when sexy young Sunny Colucci decided to park his butt right next to Logan. Sunny may look sweet but that boy ain’t shy and as he begins to play with his cock in full view of Logan’s piercing blue eyes. It looks like the two might get it on right there and then. But Logan, the conscientious businessman has to leave and suit up for work. Undeterred Sunny follows his target to the changing rooms and again tempts Logan with his schlong flopped out over his loosely draped towel. Logan can’t resist and even though fully dressed and ready for a day in the office Logan follows Sunny to the jacuzzi and, like a panther with his eye on his prey, walks straight into that water, shoe suit and all, to make a meal of this cocky flirt.
title: COOL IT: Logan Moore and Sunny Colucci
